Authors and Citation

Authors

  • Nicolas T. Wirth. Author, maintainer, copyright holder.

  • Jonathan Funk. Author.
    Co-developer of shiny app.

  • Matthias Kahm. Contributor.
    Author of 'grofit' package, whose general data structure was adopted for QurvE.

  • Maik Kschischo. Contributor.
    Author of 'grofit' package, whose general data structure was adopted for QurvE.

  • Thomas Petzoldt. Contributor.
    Creator of the package 'growthrates', whose function for calculating linear regressions served as a template in QurvE.

  • Andrew Stein. Contributor.
    Creator of 'xgxr' package from which QurvE adopted code to plot axis ticks on log10 scale.

  • Michael W. Kearney. Contributor.
    Creator of 'tfse' package from which QurvE adopted the match_arg function.

  • Santiago I. Hurtado. Contributor.
    Creator of 'RobustLinearReg' package from which QurvE adopted the Theil Sehn Regression method.

  • Mark Heckmann. Contributor.
    Creator of the 'zipFastener' function; source: https://ryouready.wordpress.com/2009/03/27/r-zip-fastener-for-two-data-frames-combining-rows-or-columns-of-two-dataframes-in-an-alternating-manner/

  • Nicholas Hamilton. Contributor.
    Creator of the 'colFmt' function.

  • Evan Friedland. Contributor.
    Creator of the 'inflect' function.

  • Heather Turner. Contributor.
    Creator of the 'base_breaks' function.

  • Georgi N. Boshnakov. Contributor.
    Creator of 'gbRd' package from which functions are used to display function help pages within the shiny app.

Citation

Source: inst/CITATION
